title: Learning Flutter
description:
During this period I had the opportunity to create several internal applications in order to verify whether Flutter is a good way to create mobile applications on multiple platforms.
As part of my training, I developed applications:
 *Codete Survey App - application for collecting personal data at conferences,
 *Water Tracker - a custom user interface,
 *Tetris - a common game logic code shared between the web and Flutter applications.
